_header: I wonder much in the writing above
Subjects: sermons, verse in; God, love of
_description: A question and answer on the love of God — two couplets in a Latin sermon commentary

Antwerp305.Transcription:
I wondyr mych in þe wrytyng aboueQwy it commendyth so mych
                    loueWryth þerof wondyr noȝt to mych in þi wytteffor all
                    þe law in loue is knytte
Antwerp305.Note:
Added to bottom margin of page by the same hand as has annotated in
                    margins throughout.
